name: Whispering Breeze
description:
Playing within the game is not very complicated. The player will be able to read the characters' conversations. try to understand And keep an eye on the characters' emotions.
The main thing players will be able to do is mix drinks for their characters. to get different stories according to the drinks that the players can brew
Game Feature
Single Player talk simulator
Brewing System
Drinks 10 drinks
Slime 4 types
Barrels 3 types
Dialogues
7 Days Dialogue
Background music
3 Different Songs
